languages.text: "Зовут меня все просто — Капеллан. Я — миссионер святого Друза. Занимаюсь проповедями, молебнами, отпеваниями для сирых и обездоленных. Отпеваний вот только особо много в последнее время... Но, вероятно, вас больше интересует откуда у священника столько боевых шрамов". {n}Он усмехается, бросая взгляд на свои испещренные белесыми полосами руки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я миссионер святого Друза. Занимаюсь проповедями, молебнами, отпеваниями для сирых и обездоленных. Отпеваний вот только особо много в последнее время... Но, вероятно, вас больше интересует откуда у священника столько боевых шрамов". {n}Он усмехается, бросая взгляд на свои испещренные белесыми полосами руки.{/n}

languages.text: "I'm known simply as Chaplain. I'm a missionary of Saint Drusus. I do sermons, public prayers, and funeral services for the lowly and destitute. I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered in pale white stripes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Зовут меня все просто — Капеллан. Я — миссионер святого Друза. Занимаюсь проповедями, молебнами, отпеваниями для сирых и обездоленных. Отпеваний вот только особо много в последнее время... Но, вероятно, вас больше интересует откуда у священника столько боевых шрамов". {n}Он усмехается, бросая взгляд на свои испещренные белесыми полосами руки.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I'm known simply as the Chaplain. I'm a missionary of Saint Drusus. I do sermons, public prayers, and funeral services for the lowly and destitute. I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms that are covered all over in pale white stripes.{/n}

I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms that are covered all over in pale white stripes.{/n}

But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered all over in pale white stripes.{/n}

I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered all over in pale white stripes.{/n}

But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered in pale white stripes.{/n}

"I'm known simply as Chaplain. I'm a missionary of Saint Drusus. I do sermons, public prayers, and funeral services for the lowly and destitute. I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered in pale white stripes.{/n}

languages.text: “大家都叫我‘牧师’。我是圣德鲁苏斯布道所的传教士，我负责举行布道、公众祈祷，为贫民与穷人举行葬礼。不得不说，我最近主要都在负责葬礼业务……不过或许你更想知道，我身为牧师，身上怎么会有这么多战斗留下来的伤疤。”{n}他笑了起来，看着自己的手臂，上面满是浅白色的疤痕。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm known simply as Chaplain. I'm a missionary of Saint Drusus. I do sermons, public prayers, and funeral services for the lowly and destitute. I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered in pale white stripes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大家都叫我‘牧师’。我是圣德鲁苏斯布道所的传教士，我负责举行布道、公众祈祷，为贫民与穷人举行葬礼。不得不说，我最近主要都在负责葬礼业务……不过或许你更想知道，我身为牧师，身上怎么会有这么多战斗留下来的伤疤。”{n}他笑了起来，看着自己的手臂，上面布满了浅白色的条纹。{/n}

languages.text: 「私はただ、教戒官として知られていますが、聖ドルススの宣教師です。卑しく貧しい者達の為に、説教や公の祈り、葬儀を行っている。最近はほとんどが葬儀だったが…でもあなたはきっと、牧師が何故ここまで傷だらけなのか、と興味があるんでしょうね」{n}彼は白い縞模様に覆われた自分の腕を見て、苦笑いを見せた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm known simply as Chaplain. I'm a missionary of Saint Drusus. I do sermons, public prayers, and funeral services for the lowly and destitute. I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered in pale white stripes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私はただ、教戒官として知られていますが、聖ドルススの宣教師です。卑しく貧しい者達の為に、説教や公の祈り、葬儀を行っている。最近はほとんどが葬儀だったが…でもあなたはきっと、牧師が何故ここまで傷だらけなのか、と興味があるんでしょうね」{n}彼は白い縞模様に覆われた自分の腕を見て、苦笑いを見せた。{/n}

languages.text: «Me conocen como Capellán. Soy misionero de san Drusus. Doy sermones, misas y servicios funerarios a los pobres e indigentes. He de decir que últimamente han sido sobre todo servicios funerarios... Pero tal vez os interese más saber por qué un sacerdote estaría tan cubierto de cicatrices». {n}Se echa a reír mientras se mira los brazos, cubiertos de rayas blancas.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm known simply as Chaplain. I'm a missionary of Saint Drusus. I do sermons, public prayers, and funeral services for the lowly and destitute. I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered in pale white stripes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Me conocen como el Capellán. Soy misionero de san Drusus. Doy sermones, misas y servicios funerarios a los pobres e indigentes. He de decir que últimamente han sido sobre todo servicios funerarios... Pero tal vez os interese más saber por qué un sacerdote estaría tan cubierto de cicatrices». {n}Se echa a reír mientras se mira los brazos, cubiertos por todas partes de rayas blancas.{/n}

languages.text: "Man nennt mich schlicht den Ordenspriester. Ich bin ein Missionar des Heiligen Drusus. Ich halte für die Armen und Verzweifelten Predigten, öffentliche Gebete und Bestattungen ab. In letzter Zeit primär Bestattungen, muss ich sagen ... Aber vielleicht interessiert Euch eher, wie ein Priester an so viele Kampfnarben kommt." {n}Er blickt lachend auf seine Arme, die mit blassen weißen Streifen bedeckt sind.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm known simply as Chaplain. I'm a missionary of Saint Drusus. I do sermons, public prayers, and funeral services for the lowly and destitute. I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered in pale white stripes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Man nennt mich schlicht den Ordenspriester. Ich bin ein Missionar des Heiligen Drusus. Ich halte für die Armen und Verzweifelten Predigten, öffentliche Gebete und Bestattungen ab. In letzter Zeit primär Bestattungen, muss ich sagen ... Aber vielleicht interessiert Euch eher, wie ein Priester an so viele Kampfnarben kommt." {n}Er blickt lachend auf seine Arme, die über und über mit blassen weißen Streifen bedeckt sind.{/n}

languages.text: « Je suis un missionnaire de Saint Drusus connu sous le nom de Chapelain. Je suis chargé des sermons, des prières publiques et des services funéraires pour les miséreux et les indigents. Enfin, je dois dire que j'ai officié à bien plus d'obsèques qu'autre chose, ces derniers temps... Mais vous vous demandez sûrement comme un prêtre a pu écoper d'autant de cicatrices, » {n}ajoute-t-il avec un petit rire tout en levant ses bras couverts de marques pâles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm known simply as Chaplain. I'm a missionary of Saint Drusus. I do sermons, public prayers, and funeral services for the lowly and destitute. I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered in pale white stripes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je suis un simple missionnaire de Saint Drusus connu sous le nom de Chapelain. Je suis chargé des sermons, des prières publiques et des services funéraires pour les miséreux et les indigents. Enfin, je dois dire que j'ai officié à bien plus d'obsèques qu'autre chose, ces derniers temps... Mais vous vous demandez sûrement comme un prêtre a pu écoper d'autant de cicatrices, » {n}ajoute-t-il avec un petit rire tout en levant ses bras couverts de marques pâles.{/n}

languages.text: "Ben yalnızca Papaz olarak bilinirim. Aziz Drusus'un bir misyoneriyim. Sıradan insanlar ve muhtaç durumdakiler için vaazlar verir, toplu dualar düzenler ve cenaze hizmetleri sağlarım. Son zamanlarda en çok ihtiyaç duyulan hizmetimin de cenazeler olduğunu belirtmem gerek. Ancak belki de siz, bir rahibin savaşlardan kalma nasıl bu kadar çok yara izine sahip olduğunu öğrenmek istiyorsunuzdur." {n}Gülümseyerek, solgun beyaz çizgilerle kaplı kollarına bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I'm known simply as Chaplain. I'm a missionary of Saint Drusus. I do sermons, public prayers, and funeral services for the lowly and destitute. I have to say it's been mostly funeral services of late... But perhaps you're more interested to know how a priest got so many battle scars." {n}He chuckles as he looks at his arms, which are covered in pale white stripes.{/n}

Sıradan insanlar ve muhtaç durumdakiler için vaazlar verir, toplu dualar düzenler ve cenaze hizmetleri sağlarım.
